signal_text: $340M for 3rd transformer manufacturing site in Jonesville SC; $1B+ invested since 2023 in North American electrical manufacturing.
messaging_hook: 3rd transformer facility announced; $1B+ invested in 2 years in US electrical manufacturing.

signal_text: $330M new Gaffney SC facility (6th US plant); expanding from 14 GW to 17.7 GW by 2027.
messaging_hook: 6th US manufacturing facility; capacity growing from 14 GW to 17.7 GW.

signal_text: Form Factory 1 expanding from 550K to 850K sq ft by end 2025; MOU with Puget Sound Energy for 10 MW/1 GWh project.
messaging_hook: Factory 1 expanding to 850K sq ft; room for future growth; pursuing multiple grid storage projects.

signal_text: $240M at $5.3B valuation; strategic investors include L3Harris and Hanwha Aerospace.
messaging_hook: $240M F-1 round at $5.3B; L3Harris and Hanwha as strategic investors.

signal_text: L3Harris and Hanwha Aerospace as strategic investors in $240M round.
messaging_hook: Defense primes L3Harris and Hanwha taking strategic positions.

signal_text: CHIPS funding for Easton PA expansion; increasing 150mm and 200mm SiC substrate capacity; 300mm capability milestone Dec 2025.
messaging_hook: CHIPS Act funding for Easton PA SiC expansion; 300mm capability milestone achieved.

signal_text: $200M+ equity investment; $1B Reno gigafactory planned; $650M Ex-Im Bank LOI; acquired all Northvolt assets.
messaging_hook: $200M+ raised; $1B Reno gigafactory; acquired Northvolt assets in Sweden/Germany.

signal_text: Acquired all remaining Northvolt assets in Sweden and Germany; planning to restart operations.
messaging_hook: Acquired Northvolt Ett and Northvolt Labs; planning restart.

signal_text: $250M first tranche from Toyota; part of long-term strategic investment.
messaging_hook: $250M Toyota investment; doubling US manufacturing capacity.

signal_text: Toyota strategic investment supporting capacity expansion; long-term collaboration.
messaging_hook: Toyota partnership supporting US capacity doubling.

signal_text: Doubling US manufacturing capacity; 4 aircraft/month by 2027; acquiring 2nd Ohio facility.
messaging_hook: Doubling US capacity; acquiring 2nd Ohio facility; 4 aircraft/month target.

signal_text: $5B Siler City fab nearing completion with room for 2M+ additional sq ft; Mohawk Valley operational; Germany fab planned.
messaging_hook: $5B Siler City fab with room for 2M+ sq ft expansion; multi-site SiC pattern.

signal_text: $52M Montgomery AL expansion (460K sq ft); 30K-unit robot factory planned for North America.
messaging_hook: Montgomery expansion + robot factory planned; expanding electrification hubs.

signal_text: Moses Lake WA facility operational; planning expansion to 250 GWh within 5 years - largest anode facility in world.
messaging_hook: Moses Lake operational; planning 250 GWh expansion = world's largest anode facility.

signal_text: Expanded PowerCo/VW agreement; Eagle Line inaugurated for pilot production; key equipment installed.
messaging_hook: Eagle Line inaugurated; expanded VW partnership; scaling solid-state production.

signal_text: Korea Battery Alliance formed; 2+ GWh global contract manufacturing network across US and South Korea.
messaging_hook: Korea Battery Alliance; 2+ GWh global contract manufacturing network.

signal_text: $300M new funding; CEO eyes expansion at PTI; Superfactory completed; diversifying into AI data center turbines.
messaging_hook: $300M new funding; CEO eyes PTI expansion; Superfactory operational.

signal_text: 60% expansion of US lithium carbonate capacity at Covington GA; new recovery line operational 2025.
messaging_hook: 60% lithium carbonate capacity expansion at Covington GA.

signal_text: $1B US manufacturing expansion; new Charlotte NC factory for transformers and gas turbines; brownfield expansions.
messaging_hook: $1B US manufacturing expansion; new Charlotte NC factory; transformer production increase.

signal_text: Hyundai expanding collaboration; plans to integrate Atlas across global network; 30K-unit robot factory by 2028.
messaging_hook: Hyundai expanding collaboration; 30K-unit robot factory planned; Atlas integration across global network.

signal_text: South Carolina plant opened (Nov 2025); SF R&D center opened (April 2025); multi-site expansion pattern.
messaging_hook: South Carolina plant + SF R&D center; expanding multi-site footprint.

signal_text: $60B total investment announced; 2 new fabs at Sherman TX megasite; SM1 production started Dec 2025.
messaging_hook: $60B investment commitment; Sherman TX megasite expanding; 2 new fabs announced.
